attributes.action: Give us a proper say on Brexit
attributes.background: It's clear that, while we might have thought we knew what we were voting for in the last referendum, none of us voted for the current shambolic mess.  We must be given another say before any firm Brexit decision is made.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/214179

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/222124

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/215795
